name: Curriculum Lifecycle Management
description: Curriculum Lifecycle Management applications enable the design, creation, maintenance, and disestablishment of curriculum for educational institutions.

name: Curriculum Accreditation
description: Curriculum Accreditation applications enable the capture, analysis, and reporting of information required for the application and maintenance of external accreditation of curricula and the schools, colleges, or institutions that deliver accredited curricula.

name: Student Recruitment
description: Student Recruitment applications enable attracting and engaging with prospective students.

name: Agent Management
description: Agent Management applications are responsible for managing international and domestic student recruitment agents.

name: Student Admission
description: Student Admission applications are responsible for managing domestic and international student admissions.

name: Student Management
description: Student Management applications support the core records, functions, and processes of the student lifecycle.

name: Credit & Articulation
description: Credit & Articulation applications recognise credits for prior student learning and suggest appropriate coursework and pathways.

name: Candidature Management
description: Candidature Management applications enable functions of the student lifecycle unique to candidates undertaking study by research.

name: Financial Aid
description: Financial Aid applications enable the administration of financial support awarded to students.

name: Scholarship Management
description: Scholarship Management applications enable the lifecycle management of non-repayable support to students.

name: Timetable Management
description: Timetable Management applications manage the scheduling and allocation of locations and resources to learning and teaching activities.

name: Exchange & Transfer Management
description: Exchange & Transfer Management applications facilitate student participation in cross-institutional study.

name: Student Conduct Management
description: Student Conduct Management applications are responsible for managing student conduct and complaints.

name: Student Portal
description: Student Portal applications present students with integrated access to aggregated views of commonly-needed information, resources, and software applications.

name: Credential Platform
description: Credential Platform applications enable the issuance, sharing, and verification of digital credentials.

name: Graduation Management
description: Graduation Management applications enable the planning and delivery of graduation ceremonies.

name: eLearning Authoring
description: eLearning Authoring applications are used to create digital learning materials.

name: Digital Learning Object Management
description: Digital Learning Object Management applications enable the lifecycle management and curation of digital learning resources.

name: Digital Media Management
description: Digital Media Management applications provide the ability to lifecycle-manage digital media content such as lecture recordings and student videos.

name: Learning Management System
description: Learning Management System applications manage and facilitate curriculum delivery.

name: Placement Management
description: Placement Management applications plan, facilitate, and track work- and community-integrated learning experiences for students.

name: Specialist Learning Tool
description: Specialist Learning Tool applications enable technology-enhanced learning and teaching.

name: Academic Advisement
description: Academic Advisement applications empower advisors and students to navigate their academic journey by evaluating study options and tracking progress towards successful completion.

name: Learning Analytics
description: Learning Analytics applications provide diagnostic, predictive, and prescriptive insights on student learning.

name: Career Support
description: Career Support applications support students in their career planning, development, and job placement.

name: Academic Integrity
description: Academic Integrity applications provide the ability to evaluate the originality and veracity of student and researcher outputs.

name: ePortfolio Management
description: ePortfolio Management applications enable students to assemble and share selected artefacts and reflections from their learning journey.

name: Examination Management
description: Examination Management applications facilitate the planning, development, and conduct of examinations.

name: Remote Proctoring
description: Remote Proctoring applications enable the invigilation of assessment activities.

name: Results Management
description: Results Management applications enable the capture, validation, and aggregation of learning assessment outcomes.

name: Research Fund Sourcing
description: Research Fund Sourcing applications assemble and present information about potential funding sources.

name: Research Grants Management
description: Research Grants Management applications facilitate the activities required to offer, receive, and administer research grants.

name: Research Ethics Management
description: Research Ethics Management applications are responsible for managing and tracking ethical clearances for research activities.

name: Innovation Management
description: Innovation Management applications facilitate the ideation process and manage the idea-to-innovation lifecycle.

name: Intellectual Property & Commercialisation
description: Intellectual Property & Commercialisation applications administer, protect, and monetise intellectual property assets.

name: Research Portal
description: Research Portal applications expose aggregated information about researchers, research activities, research outputs, and other research facets.

name: Research Infrastructure Management
description: Research Infrastructure Management applications enable the booking, scheduling, and operational oversight of research infrastructure.

name: Virtual Laboratory
description: Virtual Laboratory applications simulate real-world laboratories, providing a digital environment where laboratory functions can be conducted without the need for physical resources.

name: Laboratory Information Management
description: Laboratory Information Management applications enable the capture and management of laboratory data and processes.

name: Electronic Laboratory Notebook
description: Electronic Laboratory Notebook applications enable researchers to store, organise, and share the protocols, observations, and data generated from experiments.

name: Specimen Management
description: Specimen Management applications track the storage, use, and movement of parts, samples, or entire physical entities.

name: Animal Management
description: Animal Management applications enable the lifecycle and welfare management of animals.

name: Clinical Trials Management
description: Clinical Trials Management applications manage the conduct and administration of interventional research studies.

name: Specialist Research Tool
description: Specialist Research Tool applications enable specific functions and activities for conducting research.

name: Research Data Management Planning
description: Research Data Management Planning applications facilitate the specification and tracking of data-management plans for research datasets.

name: Research Identifier Management
description: Research Identifier Management applications create and manage unique persistent identifiers for research-related things.

name: Research Output Repository
description: Research Output Repository applications are responsible for storing research outputs, making them discoverable and sharing the research outputs with eligible parties.

name: Reference Management
description: Reference Management applications assist bibliographic referencing when writing essays, reports, and articles.

name: Research Performance Metrics
description: Research Performance Metrics applications provide insights on the quantitative performance measures of managing research at an institution.

name: Research Dissemination Metrics
description: Research Dissemination Metrics applications collect data about the publication, reuse, and impact of research findings.

name: Policy Management
description: Policy Management applications facilitate the institution-wide lifecycle management of policy artefacts.

name: Risk Management
description: Risk Management applications facilitate the recording, assessment, and tracking of risks.

name: Quality Management
description: Quality Management applications enable the monitoring and measurement of the quality of processes, products, and services.

name: Audit Management
description: Audit Management applications facilitate the scheduling, execution, and reporting of an institution’s audit and formal review activities.

name: Contract Management
description: Contract Management applications enable all types of contracts to be administered and overseen throughout their lifecycle.

name: Legal Matter Management
description: Legal Matter Management applications enable the intake and resolution of the institution’s legal affairs.

name: Meeting Management
description: Meeting Management applications facilitate the entire lifecycle of administering, conducting, and reviewing structured meetings.

name: Digital Voting
description: Digital Voting applications manage ballots, electoral rolls, online vote capture and counting, and results calculation.

name: Strategy Management
description: Strategy Management applications model, map, manage, and measure the relationship between an institution's strategic goals and its business outcomes.

name: Enterprise Architecture
description: Enterprise Architecture applications establish consolidated connected views of an institution’s current- and desirable-state strategy, business, applications, information, and technology.

name: Portfolio Management
description: Portfolio Management applications arrange information about programmes and projects into collections able to be prioritised and value-managed as coordinated portfolios of work.

name: Programme & Project Management
description: Programme & Project Management applications manage information about the initiatives an institution considers or undertakes as structured programmes and their component projects.

name: Product Management
description: Product Management applications curate information and enable workflows related to the ideation, design, build, and full lifecycle of digital and other products.

name: Service Management
description: Service Management applications enable the design, operation, and lifecycle management of an institution’s services.

name: Case Management
description: Case Management applications enable capture, assessment, and resolution of individual conduct and welfare incidents.

name: Business Continuity
description: Business Continuity applications provide functionality that enable institutions to identify and manage information and plans about how the business will continue to function in the event of disruptions to normal business operations.

name: Childcare Management
description: Childcare Management applications enable the operation of childcare facilities.

name: Healthcare Practice Management
description: Healthcare Practice Management applications enable appointment scheduling, billing, claims processing, and other related operations for medical practices.

name: Health & Safety
description: Health & Safety applications enable the data capture and reporting of hazards and incidents with the potential to harm people engaging with an institution.

name: Inventory Management
description: Inventory Management applications enable the movement, tracking and storage of physical stock throughout institution storage facilities.

name: Hazardous Material Management
description: Hazardous Material Management applications manage the lifecycle of hazardous and restricted materials used and consumed by an institution.

name: Emergency Management
description: Emergency Management applications enable the planning, coordination, and facilitation of responses to critical incidents.

name: Travel Management
description: Travel Management applications enable the booking, management, and tracking of travel and all travel-related expenses.

name: Event Management
description: Event Management applications enable the registration, coordination, and scheduling of events.

name: Equipment Booking
description: Equipment Booking applications enable users to discover, reserve, and allocate bookable assets.

name: Transportation Management
description: Transportation Management applications enable the scheduling, dispatch, routing, and fee collection for transportation services.

name: Identity Governance & Administration
description: Identity Governance & Administration applications facilitate the governance and delivery of digital-identity lifecycle-management for people and things.

name: Notice & Consent
description: Notice & Consent applications facilitate the collection, management, and tracking of the permissions granted by customers to institutions relating to how their personal data are used and consumed.

name: Entitlement Management
description: Entitlement Management applications enable the controlled administration of access to resources.

name: Identity Card
description: Identity Card applications enable the design, management, printing, encoding, and provisioning of identity cards to eligible constituents of an institution.

name: Marketing CRM
description: Marketing CRM applications extend core Customer Relationship Management applications to enable the integrated orchestration of marketing campaigns to targeted customer segments.

name: Sales CRM
description: Sales CRM applications extend core Customer Relationship Management applications to enable the management of customer journeys throughout the sales pipeline.

name: Customer Service CRM
description: Customer Service CRM applications extend core Customer Relationship Management applications to enable the capture and management of customer requests, service, support, and engagement.

name: Digital Commerce CRM
description: Digital Commerce CRM applications extend core Customer Relationship Management applications to enable the offer and sale of products and services to customers.

name: Community Engagement
description: Community Engagement applications enable institutions to plan and activate consultation and dialogue with nominated communities and with the public.

name: Alumni Management
description: Alumni Management applications enable alumni and donor relations, communications, marketing and fundraising.

name: Fundraising
description: Fundraising applications manage donor and pledge information associated with fundraising campaigns.

name: Mentoring
description: Mentoring applications facilitate the offer, matching, and coordination of interactions between mentors and mentees.

name: Voice of Customer
description: Voice of Customer applications enable the collection, categorisation, and analysis of customer feedback.

name: Survey & Evaluation
description: Survey & Evaluation applications design, send, and analyse answers or responses to questions from a target audience.

name: Brand Management
description: Brand Management applications enable the creation, storage, control, and visibility of an institution’s brand assets and how they are used.

name: Marketing Tools
description: Marketing Tools applications enable the planning, execution, and analysis of marketing activities.

name: Social Media Management
description: Social Media Management applications facilitate content scheduling, monitoring, and analytics across multiple social media platforms.

name: Financial Planning & Analysis
description: Financial Planning & Analysis applications facilitate integrated forecasting, modelling, and reporting of an institution’s financial position.

name: Expenses
description: Expenses applications help individuals and organisations keep track of, manage, and analyse their expenses.

name: Billing
description: Billing applications enable the creation, tracking, and processing of invoices.

name: Royalty Management
description: Royalty Management applications track, manage, and audit royalty dues.

name: Payment
description: Payment applications facilitate the capture and processing of financial transactions.

name: Accounting
description: Accounting applications manage and record an institution’s finances.

name: Budgeting
description: Budgeting applications enable an institution to design, manage, monitor, and alter its budgets.

name: Tax Management
description: Tax Management applications assist institutions to manage tax-related processes and obligations.

name: Payroll
description: Payroll applications facilitate the calculation and disbursement of employee salaries, wages, and other compensation.

name: Procurement
description: Procurement applications enable the sourcing and purchasing of goods and services for an institution.

name: Asset Management
description: Asset Management applications record an institution's physical assets and track them throughout their lifecycle.

name: Treasury
description: Treasury applications enable automated financial management of an institution’s cash flow, assets, and investments.

name: Workforce Planning
description: Workforce Planning applications enable institutions to model, forecast, and plan the size, shape, and composition of their workforce.

name: Talent Acquisition
description: Talent Acquisition applications support the attraction, engagement, screening, interview, and selection of candidates for open positions.

name: Workforce Administration
description: Workforce Administration applications enable institutions to manage the core data and business processes related to their workers.

name: Time & Attendance
description: Time & Attendance applications enable the scheduling and tracking of an institution’s workforce.

name: Workforce Scheduling
description: Workforce Scheduling applications match variable labour requirements to workforce capability and availability.

name: Skills Management
description: Skills Management applications enable an institution to identify and track the skills of its workforce.

name: Workforce Training & Development
description: Workforce Training & Development applications manage the training, licensing, and certification of an institution’s staff.

name: Environmental Sustainability
description: Environmental Sustainability applications enable the monitoring, measurement, and reporting of resource production and use, carbon emissions, and waste production and recycling.

name: Space Management
description: Space Management applications enable the planning, forecasting, and allocation of the institution’s physical spaces.

name: Facilities Management
description: Facilities Management applications support the maintenance, operation, and use of physical facilities.

name: Maintenance Management
description: Maintenance Management applications track and schedule maintenance work and activity for an institution’s facilities and estate.

name: Building Management System
description: Building Management System applications monitor and control the mechanical, electrical, and electromechanical services in facilities.

name: Fixed Asset Management
description: Fixed Asset Management applications track the maintenance, repair, and operations lifecycle and maintain depreciation values of fixed assets.

name: Wayfinding
description: Wayfinding applications enable people to find, plan, and navigate routes to destinations and landmarks throughout an institution’s estate.

name: Physical Access Control
description: Physical Access Control applications control the ability of individuals to enter protected locations.

name: Workspace Booking
description: Workspace Booking applications enable individuals to reserve physical spaces within shared environments for designated periods.

name: Parking
description: Parking applications enable the use and management of vehicle parking services provided by an institution.

name: Collection Management
description: Collection Management applications assist in the acquisition, cataloguing, administration, and exhibition of items.

name: Library Management
description: Library Management applications enable circulation history, administration, cataloguing, reporting, and patron records.

name: Accommodation
description: Accommodation applications enable the management of an institution’s residential facilities.

name: Clubs & Societies Management
description: Clubs & Societies Management applications facilitate the operation of an institution’s constituent-led communities and organisations.

name: Sport & Recreation
description: Sport & Recreation applications enable the management of sport and recreation activities, events, and teams.

name: Retail
description: Retail applications facilitate the operation of shops and businesses.
